participant_1.background:
My pets are all rescues and they have brought so much joy into my life.
i work at a local party store.
i m angry at my coworker.

i am a lesbian.

participant_2.background:
I started a blog on parenting and shared my jokes to cheer people up.
I am not very good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer
I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well! How about yours?
Not bad! Just got back from a bike ride with my dad. It's been a while since we did that together.
That sounds nice! I used to love bike rides with my dad too. Now I have my own beagle dogs, Chance and Boomer, and we like to go on walks together.
I love dogs! I have a cat named Mittens, but she's not very interested in walks.
Awww, cats are cute too. Maybe you can take her for a walk in a stroller?
That's a great idea! I'll have to try that.
What kind of work do you do?
I work at a local party store. It's a lot of fun, but sometimes I get a little stressed out.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job! What's the most stressful part?
I have a coworker who is always late, and it makes me really angry.
Ugh, that's so annoying! I hate when people are late.
Me too! But I'm trying to be patient with her.
Good for you! It's important to be patient, especially at work.
